description: 主キー。薬剤の作用タイプ（例：アゴニスト、アンタゴニスト）。
作用タイプがどのように使用されるかの説明
作用タイプの上位分類（例：正の作用と負の作用）

sample_rows.説明: Binds to a substance such as a cell surface antigen, targetting a drug to that location, but not necessarily affecting the functioning of the substance itself
Binds to a metal, reducing its availability for further interactions
Induces cross-linking of proteins or nucleic acids
Destabilises or disrupts a protein complex, macromolecular assembly, cell membrane etc
Hydrolyses a substrate through enzymatic reaction
